snippet: An American naval vessel was damaged in the overnight collision with a Japanese-owned tanker, but no injuries or spills were reported.
abstract: American naval vessel collides with a Japanese-owned oil tanker just outside the strategic Strait of Hormuz; Navy officials report that the cause of the crash, which was not combat-related is yet to be determined; no injuries or spills have been reported.
lead_paragraph: An American naval vessel was damaged in the overnight collision with a Japanese-owned tanker, but no injuries or spills were reported.

headline.seo: Destroyer Porter and Tanker Collide Near Persian Gulf
headline.main: Tanker Leaves Gash in U.S. Destroyer After Collision Near Strait of Hormuz
headline.print_headline: Tanker Leaves Gash in U.S. Destroyer After Collision Near Strait of Hormuz
